ComicInfo.Summary: The CHARGE TO 100 brought everything together in Mighty Morphin Power Rangers #100, now discover the bold new future for the bestselling franchise! Writer Melissa Flores (Power Rangers, The Dead Lucky) and artist Simona Di Gianfelice (All-New Firefly) reunite all of your favorite Rangers, recharged and ready for a bold new direction for your favorite Teenagers With Attitude that begins right here!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-20 07:11:05. [CVDB952566]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Arif Prianto, Bon Bernardo, Dani Pendergast, David Mack, Daz Tibbles, Francesco Tomaselli, Gretel Lusky, Ivan Tao, John Giang, Mateus Manhanini, Rose Besch, Santa Fung, Tyler Kirkham
ComicInfo.Characters: Adam Park, Aisha Campbell, Alpha 5, Baboo, Bulk, Ernie, Finster, Goldar, Kimberly Hart, Lord Zedd, Matthew Cook, Rita Repulsa, Rocky DeSantos, Skull, Squatt, The Vessel, Tommy Oliver, Zordon
ComicInfo.Teams: Evil Space Aliens, Guardians of Eltar, Power Rangers, Putty Patrol
ComicInfo.Locations: California, Earth, The Command Center, The Moon
